original: bla ma'i zhal la brten nas shes par bya'i gzhan du na glegs bam klag pa tsam las ni skye ba lnga brgyar yang de kho na nyid thob par mi 'gyur te 'khrul pa skyed par byed pa nyid dang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i tshig ni shin tu
analyzed: bla ma'i zhal la brten nas shes par bya'i gzhan du na glegs bam klag pa tsam las ni skye ba lnga brgyar yang de kho na nyid thob par mi 'gyur te 'khrul pa skyed par byed pa nyid dang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i tshig ni shin tu
translated: One should know this in dependence on the guru's mouth. Otherwise, it will not be obtained even in five hundred lifetimes, because it is generated by error and because the words spoken by the Bhagavat are very

original: zab pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zab pa'i phyir ro //
translated: profound.

original: gal te shes rab dang ldan @62b pa nyid yin pa'i phyir sdug bsngal chen pos sngags dang rgyud kyi don ci zhig ci ltar rtogs pa yin yang /
analyzed: gal te shes rab dang ldan @62b pa nyid yin pa'i phyir sdug bsngal chen pos sngags dang rgyud kyi don ci zhig ci ltar rtogs pa yin yang /
translated: Even if one has wisdom, how and what is the meaning of the mantra and tantra understood through great suffering?

original: 'on kyang bla ma'i zhal med par sngags kyi dngos grub 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa grub par mi 'gyur bas de'i phyir rje btsun bla ma rdo rje 'chang gi zhal snga nas dad pa dang 'bad pas mnyes par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang bla ma'i zhal med par sngags kyi dngos grub 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa grub par mi 'gyur bas de'i phyir rje btsun bla ma rdo rje 'chang gi zhal snga nas dad pa dang 'bad pas mnyes par bya ba yin te /
translated: However, without the guru's mouth, the mundane and supramundane siddhis of mantra will not be accomplished. Therefore, one should please the mouth of the venerable guru Vajradhara with faith and effort.

original: de'i zhal las de kho na nyid thob par 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs pa yin te sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: de'i zhal las de kho na nyid thob par 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs pa yin te sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: The meaning is that one should think, ‚ÄúI will attain reality from his mouth,‚Äù and the text is literal.

original: da ni dpal gsang ba 'dus pa las gnas pa'i de kho na nyid gang yin pa de nyid mdor bstan pa'i sgo nas bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni dpal gsang ba 'dus pa las gnas pa'i de kho na nyid gang yin pa de nyid mdor bstan pa'i sgo nas bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to teach just that reality of abiding that is in the glorious Guhyasamaja by way of a brief explanation,

original: de la dang po kho na rlung gi de kho na nyid mdor bstan pa'i tshig rtsa ba'i rgyud la 'jug par bya ste zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de la dang po kho na rlung gi de kho na nyid mdor bstan pa'i tshig rtsa ba'i rgyud la 'jug par bya ste zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: [the BhagavƒÅn] declares, ‚ÄúThere, just at the beginning, one should enter into the root tantra with the words of the brief explanation of the reality of wind.‚Äù

original: rlung gi de kho na nyid ni sngar bshad pa'o //
analyzed: rlung gi de kho na nyid ni sngar bshad pa'o //
translated: The reality of wind was explained previously.

original: mdor bstan pa'i tshig ni gleng slong ba'i tshig go //
analyzed: mdor bstan pa'i tshig ni gleng slong ba'i tshig go //
translated: The words of the brief explanation are the words of introduction.

original: rtsa ba'i rgyud las te dpal ldan gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud la gzhug par bya zhing brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba ni sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i rgyud las te dpal ldan gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud la gzhug par bya zhing brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba ni sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: One should enter into the root tantra, that is, the glorious Guhyasamaja Tantra, and should express it. This is literal.

original: sna'i rtse mor yungs kar bsam //
analyzed: sna'i rtse mor yungs kar bsam //
translated: One should imagine a mustard seed at the tip of the nose.

original: 'gro dang mi 'gro yungs kar la //
analyzed: 'gro dang mi 'gro yungs kar la //
translated: The moving and unmoving world is in the mustard seed.

original: ye shes gnas ni nyams dga' ba //
analyzed: ye shes gnas ni nyams dga' ba //
translated: The abode of exalted wisdom is delightful.

original: gsang ba'i ye shes kyis brtags bsgoms //
analyzed: gsang ba'i ye shes kyis brtags bsgoms //
translated: The secret pristine consciousness is examined and meditated.

original: rin chen kha dog sna lnga pa //
analyzed: rin chen kha dog sna lnga pa //
translated: The five-colored jewel

original: yungs kar gyi ni 'bru tshod tsam //üîΩsna yi rtse mor nan tan du //
analyzed: yungs kar gyi ni 'bru tshod tsam // sna yi rtse mor nan tan du //
translated: is the size of a mustard seed.üîΩThe yogi should always meditate

original: rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu bsgom //üîΩzhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu bsgom // zhes bya ba la /
translated: with awareness on the tip of the nose.üîΩIn the first [line], ‚Äúthe tip of the nose‚Äù means the secret place, the heart, and the tip of the nose on the face.

original: dang por rdo rje 'chang chen po la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams las gang yang rung bas sna'i rtse mor te gsang ba dang snying ga dang gdong gi sna'i rtse mo rnams su yungs kar te byang chub kyis sems kyi thig le tho rangs kyi skar chen
analyzed: dang por rdo rje 'chang chen po la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams las gang yang rung bas sna'i rtse mor te gsang ba dang snying ga dang gdong gi sna'i rtse mo rnams su yungs kar te byang chub kyis sems kyi thig le tho rangs kyi skar chen
translated: The yogi of any of the [systems] of Vajradhara, and so on, should meditate on the tip of the nose on the great star of dawn, the bindu of bodhicitta, the size of a mustard seed,

original: gyi rnam pa can rtsa'i 'khor lo thams cad kyi nang nas byung ba'i byang chub kyi sems kyi snying po bsdus pa'i ngo bor bsams te /
analyzed: gyi rnam pa can rtsa'i 'khor lo thams cad kyi nang nas byung ba'i byang chub kyi sems kyi snying po bsdus pa'i ngo bor bsams te /
translated: the essence of the bodhicitta that arises from all the channels, imagined as the nature of the bindu.

original: de'i rjes la phyi rol gyi mngon par zhen pa spang pa'i phyir yungs kar de la 'gro dang mi 'gro ste /
analyzed: de'i rjes la phyi rol gyi mngon par zhen pa spang pa'i phyir yungs kar de la 'gro dang mi 'gro ste /
translated: After that, in order to abandon external clinging, that mustard seed is ‚Äúmoving and not moving,‚Äù

original: brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i bdag nyid can gyi khams gsum pa de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyi 'khor los nang du bcug nas thams cad kyi bdag nyid du bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i bdag nyid can gyi khams gsum pa de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyi 'khor los nang du bcug nas thams cad kyi bdag nyid du bsam par bya ste /
translated: Having entered into that three-realm nature, which is both stable and moving, by means of the circle of light rays, one should contemplate the nature of everything.

original: de ltar na bdag dang gzhan gyi rnam par rtog pa spangs pa'i rnal 'byor pa ni de tsam la gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na bdag dang gzhan gyi rnam par rtog pa spangs pa'i rnal 'byor pa ni de tsam la gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, the yogƒ´/nƒ´, who has abandoned the concepts of self and other, abides in just that.

original: de'i rjes la ye shes te rlung bcu po rnams so //
analyzed: de'i rjes la ye shes te rlung bcu po rnams so //
translated: After that, the ‚Äúwisdom‚Äù is the ten winds.

original: gnas ni yi ge gsum mo//
analyzed: gnas ni yi ge gsum mo//
translated: The ‚Äúplace‚Äù is the three syllables.

original: @63a * // nyams dga' ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'o //
analyzed: @63a * // nyams dga' ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'o //
translated: The ‚Äúdelight‚Äù is the five TathƒÅgatas.

original: gsang ba ni lha mo rnams so //
analyzed: gsang ba ni lha mo rnams so //
translated: The ‚Äúsecret‚Äù is the goddesses.

original: ye shes ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
analyzed: ye shes ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
translated: The ‚Äúwisdom‚Äù is the bodhisattvas.

original: brtags pa ni khro bo rnams te /
analyzed: brtags pa ni khro bo rnams te /
translated: The ‚Äúimagined‚Äù is the wrathful ones.

original: de'i bdag nyid du bsgom zhing bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid du bsgom zhing bsam par bya'o //
translated: One should meditate and contemplate their nature.

original: de nyid kyi phyir kha dog sna lnga pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir kha dog sna lnga pa ste /
translated: For that very reason, it is ‚Äúfive-colored,‚Äù

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rab tu dbye bas 'od zer gyi tshogs 'phro bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rab tu dbye bas 'od zer gyi tshogs 'phro bar byed pa yin no //
translated: and it emits a mass of light rays by means of the divisions of the TathƒÅgata family.

original: sems can gyi khams chen po spro ba'i rnal 'byor gyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin pa'i phyir rin po che dang 'dra ba ni rin chen te rin po che chen po'o //
analyzed: sems can gyi khams chen po spro ba'i rnal 'byor gyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin pa'i phyir rin po che dang 'dra ba ni rin chen te rin po che chen po'o //
translated: It is like a jewel because it fulfills all the aspirations of the yoga that delights the great realm of sentient beings.

original: yungs kar gyi ni 'bru tshod tsam ste yungs kar phra mo'i 'bru tshad tsam /
analyzed: yungs kar gyi ni 'bru tshod tsam ste yungs kar phra mo'i 'bru tshad tsam /
translated: The size of a mustard seed means the size of a small mustard seed.

original: sna'i rtse mor te rdo rje dang padma dag las gang yang rung ba de'i rtse mor bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: sna'i rtse mor te rdo rje dang padma dag las gang yang rung ba de'i rtse mor bsgom par bya'o //
translated: At the tip of the nose, at the tip of either the vajra or lotus.

original: rnal 'byor rig pas zhes bya ba ni yan lag drug pa'i phyogs gcig srog dang rtsol ba mngon par shes pa'i rnal 'byor pas so //
analyzed: rnal 'byor rig pas zhes bya ba ni yan lag drug pa'i phyogs gcig srog dang rtsol ba mngon par shes pa'i rnal 'byor pas so //
translated: By the yoga practitioner who knows, by the yoga practitioner who has the superknowledge of prƒÅ·πáa and ƒÅyƒÅma, which is one part of the six-branched yoga.

original: rtag tu ni nyin mtshan kun du ste /
analyzed: rtag tu ni nyin mtshan kun du ste /
translated: Always, day and night,

original: ji srid rtse gcig par gyur pa'i bar du zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ji srid rtse gcig par gyur pa'i bar du zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: as long as there is one-pointedness, is the meaning.

original: 'di skad du brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: 'di skad du brjod par bya ste /
translated: This should be stated as follows:

original: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rigs can gyi rnal 'byor pa'i bye brag gis sna'i rtse mo gsum dang smin ma'i dbus dang lte bar rang dang gzhan du rnam par 'byed pa spangs pa'i thig le tsam rnam par bkod de /
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rigs can gyi rnal 'byor pa'i bye brag gis sna'i rtse mo gsum dang smin ma'i dbus dang lte bar rang dang gzhan du rnam par 'byed pa spangs pa'i thig le tsam rnam par bkod de /
translated: The yogi/nƒ´ of the type of passion, etc. should arrange the mere drop, which is free from the differentiation of self and other, at the three nose-tips, between the eyebrows, and at the navel.

original: ji srid du sems rtse gcig pa nyid thob pa de srid du goms par bya'o //
analyzed: ji srid du sems rtse gcig pa nyid thob pa de srid du goms par bya'o //
translated: He should practice as long as he attains one-pointedness of mind.

original: thig le ji lta bu zhig ces bya ba'i khyad par brjod par bya dgos so zhe na brjod par bya ste /üîΩgsang ba'i snar ni thabs dang shes rab snyoms par zhugs pa'i sgo nas byang chub kyi sems 'dus par gyur pa'i thig le'i gzugs su bsgom mo //
analyzed: thig le ji lta bu zhig ces bya ba'i khyad par brjod par bya dgos so zhe na brjod par bya ste / gsang ba'i snar ni thabs dang shes rab snyoms par zhugs pa'i sgo nas byang chub kyi sems 'dus par gyur pa'i thig le'i gzugs su bsgom mo //
translated: One may ask, What is the drop like? It should be said:üîΩ At the secret nose-tip, he should meditate on the form of the drop, which is the gathering of the bodhicitta, by means of the union of method and wisdom.

original: snying ga'i snar ni aom dang ngag gi dbang phyug gi sa bon bsdus shing sems kyi sa bon yang bsdus nas sngags kyi thig le'i gzugs su bsgom mo //
analyzed: snying ga'i snar ni aom dang ngag gi dbang phyug gi sa bon bsdus shing sems kyi sa bon yang bsdus nas sngags kyi thig le'i gzugs su bsgom mo //
translated: At the heart nose-tip, he should meditate on the form of the mantra drop, having gathered the seed of Om and the seed of VƒÅgƒ´≈õvara, and having gathered the seed of mind.

original: gdong gi snar ni dkyil 'khor bzhi'i rim gyis spros pa'i 'od zer gyi 'khor lo kha dog dmar po la sogs bsdus pa'i 'od kyi thig le'i gzugs su bsgom mo //
analyzed: gdong gi snar ni dkyil 'khor bzhi'i rim gyis spros pa'i 'od zer gyi 'khor lo kha dog dmar po la sogs bsdus pa'i 'od kyi thig le'i gzugs su bsgom mo //
translated: One should meditate on the form of a drop of light, which is the gathering of the red light-circle of emanated rays of the four mandala stages, at the tip of the nose.

original: kha cig ni gsang ba'i sna'i thig le nyid thur du sel ba'i rlung gis drangs nas gnyis por gzung bar bya ste /
analyzed: kha cig ni gsang ba'i sna'i thig le nyid thur du sel ba'i rlung gis drangs nas gnyis por gzung bar bya ste /
translated: Some say that the drop at the secret nose is drawn down by the downward-voiding wind and held at the two,

original: de ni bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the nature of great bliss.

original: de bzhin du gzhan dag gis kyang smin ma dang @63b lte ba'i dbus dag tu brtag par bya'o zhes zer ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan dag gis kyang smin ma dang @63b lte ba'i dbus dag tu brtag par bya'o zhes zer ro //
translated: In the same way, others say that it should be investigated in the middle of the eyebrows and the navel.

original: 'di ni dgongs pas bshad pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni dgongs pas bshad pa'o //
translated: This is an explanation by way of the intention.

original: zhes bya ba la dgongs pas bshad pa zhes bya ba ni gang zag dbang po rnon po'i don du 'gal pa'i tshig gis de kho na nyid 'ba' zhig ston par byed pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la dgongs pas bshad pa zhes bya ba ni gang zag dbang po rnon po'i don du 'gal pa'i tshig gis de kho na nyid 'ba' zhig ston par byed pa ste /
translated: An explanation by way of the intention is a teaching of reality alone by means of contradictory words for the sake of a person of sharp faculties.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: pha dang ma ni gsad bya zhing //
analyzed: pha dang ma ni gsad bya zhing //
translated: One should kill one's father and mother,üîΩand also one's relatives.

original: rgyal po gtsang spra can gnyis dang // yul 'khor rdzas 'jug bcas bsad na //
analyzed: rgyal po gtsang spra can gnyis dang // yul 'khor rdzas 'jug bcas bsad na //
translated: The two kings, the one with the clean beard and the one with the dirty beard, and the one who seized the kingdom and the goods, were killed.

original: mi ni dam pa rjes su brjod //
analyzed: mi ni dam pa rjes su brjod //
translated: The good man is praised.

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa bzhin no //
translated: And so on.

original: da ni bshad pa /
analyzed: da ni bshad pa /
translated: Now, the explanation:

original: rdo rje'i tshig 'di'i bshad pa'i lha mo bzhis zhus pa'i bya ba bshad pa'i rgyud las zhes bya ba gsungs te rdo rje ltar mi shigs shing zab mo'i don can gyi tshig ni ste tshig gis brtsams pa'i ngag go //
analyzed: rdo rje'i tshig 'di'i bshad pa'i lha mo bzhis zhus pa'i bya ba bshad pa'i rgyud las zhes bya ba gsungs te rdo rje ltar mi shigs shing zab mo'i don can gyi tshig ni ste tshig gis brtsams pa'i ngag go //
translated: The explanation of these vajra words is from the Tantra of the Four Goddesses' Questions, called the Explanation. The words that are like a vajra, indestructible and of profound meaning, are the words that compose the text.

original: 'di zhes bya ba sngar bshad pa'i rdo rje'i tshig gi bshad pa ste /
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba sngar bshad pa'i rdo rje'i tshig gi bshad pa ste /
translated: This is the explanation of the previously explained vajra words.

original: rnam par dbye ba lha mo bzhi ste sangs rgyas spyan la sogs pa rnams kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba'i bshad pa'i rgyud las gsungs te sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par dbye ba lha mo bzhi ste sangs rgyas spyan la sogs pa rnams kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba'i bshad pa'i rgyud las gsungs te sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: The four goddesses are the questioners, and it is said in the Tantra of the Four Goddesses' Questions, called the Explanation, in a literal way.

original: snying po las ni snying po mchog //
analyzed: snying po las ni snying po mchog //
translated: The supreme essence from the essence,

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba ni //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba ni //
translated: the secret of all buddhas,

original: gang de thams cad bdag nyid gnas //
analyzed: gang de thams cad bdag nyid gnas //
translated: that in which everything abides.

original: de nyid lha mo bshad par bya //
analyzed: de nyid lha mo bshad par bya //
translated: That is explained as the goddess.

original: ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin dbugs //
analyzed: ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin dbugs //
translated: The breath has the nature of the five intuitions.

original: yungs kar gyi ni 'bru tshod tsam //
analyzed: yungs kar gyi ni 'bru tshod tsam //
translated: It is the size of a mustard seed.

original: de yi dbus su gnas pa'i lha //
analyzed: de yi dbus su gnas pa'i lha //
translated: The deity abides in its middle.

original: mi gsal gsal ba'i bdag nyid can //
analyzed: mi gsal gsal ba'i bdag nyid can //
translated: It has the nature of being unclear and clear.

original: zhes gsungs pa'i don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa'i don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of this is as follows:

original: de nyid ni don dam pa ste kye lha mo sangs rgyas spyan la sogs pa'i rigs kyi yum khyed rnams la bshad par bya zhing rab tu phye nas bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni don dam pa ste kye lha mo sangs rgyas spyan la sogs pa'i rigs kyi yum khyed rnams la bshad par bya zhing rab tu phye nas bshad par bya'o //
translated: That is the ultimate. O goddess, I will explain to you, the mother of the Buddha LochanƒÅ and the other families, I will explain by distinguishing it.

original: de nyid ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: de nyid ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is that like?

original: snying po ste spyod pa'i rgyud la sogs pa la ltos nas mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa lnga'i rim gyis bskyed pa'i lha'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: snying po ste spyod pa'i rgyud la sogs pa la ltos nas mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa lnga'i rim gyis bskyed pa'i lha'i rnam pa'o //
translated: The essence is the deity form generated by the process of the five manifest enlightenments in dependence on the tantras of action and so forth.

original: de dag las kyang snying po ni yan lag drug pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: de dag las kyang snying po ni yan lag drug pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: And among those, the essence is the stage of completion characterized by the six-branched yoga and so forth.

original: de las kyang khyad par du 'phags pa nyid yin pa'i phyir shin tu ste /
analyzed: de las kyang khyad par du 'phags pa nyid yin pa'i phyir shin tu ste /
translated: And that is also the most excellent, because it is superior.

original: rdo rje bzlas pa'i rnam grangs gzhan rlung gi de kho na nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bzlas pa'i rnam grangs gzhan rlung gi de kho na nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: The other name for vajra repetition is ‚Äúthe reality of the winds.‚Äù

original: de nyid kyi phyir ting nge 'dzin thams cad la khyad bar du 'phags pa nyid yin pas mchog ste dam pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir ting nge 'dzin thams cad la khyad bar du 'phags pa nyid yin pas mchog ste dam pa'o //
translated: It is the best, the highest, because it is superior to all other meditative concentrations.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi ste phung po lngas bsdus pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin pas gsang ba'o //üîΩyang na ra dang ha ste rdo rje dang padma dag sbyor ba las @64a * //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi ste phung po lngas bsdus pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin pas gsang ba'o // yang na ra dang ha ste rdo rje dang padma dag sbyor ba las @64a * //
translated: It is secret because it is the nature of all the buddhas, included within the five aggregates.

original: byung ba'i gsang ba'o //
analyzed: byung ba'i gsang ba'o //
translated: Or else, it is secret because it arises from the union of ra and ha, that is, the vajra and lotus.

original: yang na bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams la gsad bar bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir gsang ba'o //
analyzed: yang na bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams la gsad bar bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir gsang ba'o //
translated: Or else, it is secret because it is to be killed by the yogis of the creation stage.

original: thams cad bdag nyid de sku dang gsung dang thugs dag gi gcig pa'i dngos por gnas pa ni bsdus pa'i gnas skabs su gyur pa'o//
analyzed: thams cad bdag nyid de sku dang gsung dang thugs dag gi gcig pa'i dngos por gnas pa ni bsdus pa'i gnas skabs su gyur pa'o//
translated: The nature of all is the state of being of the body, speech, and mind, which is the state of being included in the one thing.

original: yang na thams cad bdag nyid de cha drug pa'i lus la gtso bor gyur pa'i khams kyi gzugs kyis gnas pa'o //
analyzed: yang na thams cad bdag nyid de cha drug pa'i lus la gtso bor gyur pa'i khams kyi gzugs kyis gnas pa'o //
translated: Or else, the nature of all is the state of being of the body, which is the six parts, the form of the principal element.

original: de bzhin du ye shes lnga ni me long lta bu la sogs pa'i ye shes rnams so //
analyzed: de bzhin du ye shes lnga ni me long lta bu la sogs pa'i ye shes rnams so //
translated: Likewise, the five pristine awarenesses are the pristine awarenesses of the mirror and so forth.

original: de'i rang bzhin ni de'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin ni de'i ngo bo'o //
translated: Their nature is their essence.

original: de bzhin du yang de'i me long gsal po dang zla ba'i 'od zer dkar po lta bu'i rnam pa'i gzugs can gang yin pa de ni me long lta bu'i ye shes so //
analyzed: de bzhin du yang de'i me long gsal po dang zla ba'i 'od zer dkar po lta bu'i rnam pa'i gzugs can gang yin pa de ni me long lta bu'i ye shes so //
translated: Likewise, that which has the form of the clear mirror and the white light rays of the moon is the mirror-like pristine awareness.

original: khams kyi rdzas nyi shu rtsa bzhi ro gcig pa'i dngos por gnas pa gang yin pa de ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
analyzed: khams kyi rdzas nyi shu rtsa bzhi ro gcig pa'i dngos por gnas pa gang yin pa de ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
translated: The twenty-four substances of the elements abiding in the state of one taste is the pristine awareness of equality.

original: de'i 'gro ba dang mi 'gro ba gcig pa'i rang bzhin nyid du dpyod pa gang yin pa de ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: de'i 'gro ba dang mi 'gro ba gcig pa'i rang bzhin nyid du dpyod pa gang yin pa de ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so //
translated: The analysis of the nature of the one going and not going is the pristine awareness of discernment.

original: de las 'od zer gyi 'khor lo spros pas 'gro ba'i don byed pa gang yin pa de ni bya ba nan tan sgrub pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: de las 'od zer gyi 'khor lo spros pas 'gro ba'i don byed pa gang yin pa de ni bya ba nan tan sgrub pa'i ye shes so //
translated: The performance of the benefit of migrating beings by emanating the circle of light rays from that is the pristine awareness of accomplishing activities.

original: de'i nang du shin tu gsal ba'i rang bzhin gyi ye shes bde ba chen po rang gi ngo bor nyams su myong ba gang yin pa de ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i nang du shin tu gsal ba'i rang bzhin gyi ye shes bde ba chen po rang gi ngo bor nyams su myong ba gang yin pa de ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: That which is experienced as the nature of great bliss, the pristine wisdom of the very clear nature, is to be called the pristine wisdom of the ultimate realm.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Therefore,

original: yungs kar gyi ni 'bru tshod tsam //
analyzed: yungs kar gyi ni 'bru tshod tsam //
translated: the size of a mustard seed

original: zhes bya ba 'di ni de'i tshad bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'di ni de'i tshad bshad pa yin te /
translated: is explained as the measure of that.

original: de lta bu snga ma bzhin sna'i rtse mor gnas par bsams nas /
analyzed: de lta bu snga ma bzhin sna'i rtse mor gnas par bsams nas /
translated: Having imagined it in that way, as before, located at the tip of the nose,

original: thig le tsam de'i dbus na gnas pa ste yang dag par gnas pa lha rdo rje 'chang chen po bsgom par bya'o ;
analyzed: thig le tsam de'i dbus na gnas pa ste yang dag par gnas pa lha rdo rje 'chang chen po bsgom par bya'o ;
translated: one should meditate on the deity Great Vajradhara, who is located in the center of that mere drop, who is perfectly located.

original: / de ji lta bu zhig ce na /
analyzed: / de ji lta bu zhig ce na /
translated: What is he like?

original: mi gsal ba zhes bya ba khyad par byed pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin pas zhal dang phyag dang sku mdog dang dbyibs med pa'o //
analyzed: mi gsal ba zhes bya ba khyad par byed pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin pas zhal dang phyag dang sku mdog dang dbyibs med pa'o //
translated: He is called ‚Äúunclear,‚Äù because he is the nature of a differentiator, and so he is without faces, arms, body color, and shape.

original: gsal ba'i bdag nyid can zhes bya ba ni de nyid gangs dang zla ba dang me tog kunda lta bu'i gzugs kyis gnas pa ste /
analyzed: gsal ba'i bdag nyid can zhes bya ba ni de nyid gangs dang zla ba dang me tog kunda lta bu'i gzugs kyis gnas pa ste /
translated: The nature of clarity is that very [vajra body] abiding in the form of snow, moon, and jasmine flowers.

original: zla gsang thig le las kyang /
analyzed: zla gsang thig le las kyang /
translated: And in the Candragarbha Drop Tantra:

original: rin chen ltar 'bar byang chub sems spros pas //
analyzed: rin chen ltar 'bar byang chub sems spros pas //
translated: The bodhicitta, blazing like a jewel,

original: rgyal ba kun gyi yongs su dag pa'i sku //üîΩzhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyal ba kun gyi yongs su dag pa'i sku // zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: is the completely pure body of all victors.üîΩAnd so forth.

original: da ni so sor bshad pa 'dus pa'i rgud phyi ma las kyang don 'di nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba gsungs te /üîΩ@64b 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma ni /
analyzed: da ni so sor bshad pa 'dus pa'i rgud phyi ma las kyang don 'di nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba gsungs te / @64b 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma ni /
translated: Now, in order to clarify this very meaning also from the later Gathering of the Great Assembly Tantra, it says, in the later Gathering of the Great Assembly Tantra.

original: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rdo rje'i tshig dka' ba bshad pa'i mtshan nyid le'u bco brgyad pa'o //
analyzed: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rdo rje'i tshig dka' ba bshad pa'i mtshan nyid le'u bco brgyad pa'o //
translated: The later Gathering of the Great Assembly Tantra is the eighteen chapters of the glorious Guhyasamaja, characterized by the explanation of the difficult vajra words.

original: de las kyang don 'di nyid nges par bstan te /
analyzed: de las kyang don 'di nyid nges par bstan te /
translated: And from that very tantra, this very meaning is definitely taught.

original: rgyud phyi ma ni rdo rje'i tshig gis the tshom sel bar byed pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyud phyi ma ni rdo rje'i tshig gis the tshom sel bar byed pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the later tantra has the nature of removing doubts with vajra words.

original: yi ge'i don to //
analyzed: yi ge'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the words.

original: ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin dbugs //
analyzed: ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin dbugs //
translated: The nature of the five intuitions is the breath.

original: 'byung ba lnga yi ngo bo can //
analyzed: 'byung ba lnga yi ngo bo can //
translated: It has the essence of the five elements.

original: padma'i sna rtser phyung nas ni //
analyzed: padma'i sna rtser phyung nas ni //
translated: Having brought it forth at the tip of the lotus,

original: gong bu'i gzugs su brtag par bya //
analyzed: gong bu'i gzugs su brtag par bya //
translated: one should imagine it in the form of a globe.

original: rin chen kha dog sna lnga pa //
analyzed: rin chen kha dog sna lnga pa //
translated: The five-colored jewel

original: srog dang rtsol ba zhes byar bshad //
analyzed: srog dang rtsol ba zhes byar bshad //
translated: is explained as the life-force and the exertion.

original: rang sngags snying gar bsams nas ni //
analyzed: rang sngags snying gar bsams nas ni //
translated: Having imagined one‚Äôs mantra at the heart,

original: sems ni thig ler gyur bar gzag /
analyzed: sems ni thig ler gyur bar gzag /
translated: one should imagine the mind as a drop.

original: ces bya ba'i don ni 'di yin te 'dir ni yan lag drug pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rim pas bsnyen pa bshad pa'i skabs su yan lag gsum po srog dang rtsol ba rnam par bshad par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi tshigs su bcad pa gnyis
analyzed: ces bya ba'i don ni 'di yin te 'dir ni yan lag drug pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rim pas bsnyen pa bshad pa'i skabs su yan lag gsum po srog dang rtsol ba rnam par bshad par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi tshigs su bcad pa gnyis
translated: The meaning of this is as follows: Here, in the context of explaining the service by the process of the six-branched yoga, in order to explain the life-force and the exertion, the TathƒÅgatas have spoken two verses.

original: gsungs pa'o // ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: gsungs pa'o // ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin ni bshad zin to //
translated: The nature of the five intuitions has already been explained.

original: rlung bcu po sdud par byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir dbugs so //
analyzed: rlung bcu po sdud par byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir dbugs so //
translated: It is the breath because it is the gathering of the ten winds.

original: 'byung ba lnga ni sa la sogs pa nam mkha' la thug pa rnams te //
analyzed: 'byung ba lnga ni sa la sogs pa nam mkha' la thug pa rnams te //
translated: The five elements are earth and so on up to space.

original: de'i ngo bo can ni rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo can ni rang bzhin no //
translated: Its essence is its nature.

original: de bzhin du yang de'i skabs dang sra ba nyid gang yin pa de ni sa'i 'byung ba chen po'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du yang de'i skabs dang sra ba nyid gang yin pa de ni sa'i 'byung ba chen po'o //
translated: Similarly, that which is its occasion and solidity is the earth element.

original: zhu bar byed pa nyid dang tshim par byed pa nyid ni chu'i 'byung ba chen po nyid do //
analyzed: zhu bar byed pa nyid dang tshim par byed pa nyid ni chu'i 'byung ba chen po nyid do //
translated: That which is fluidity and satisfaction is the water element.

original: reg bya dro ba khyad par du 'phags pa dang gsal ba nyid ni me'i 'byung ba chen po'o //
analyzed: reg bya dro ba khyad par du 'phags pa dang gsal ba nyid ni me'i 'byung ba chen po'o //
translated: That which is the distinctive heat of touch and clarity is the fire element.

original: 'gro ba dang 'od ba dang g-yo ba'i ngo bo nyid ni rlung gi 'byung ba chen po'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba dang 'od ba dang g-yo ba'i ngo bo nyid ni rlung gi 'byung ba chen po'o //
translated: That which is the essence of going, coming, and movement is the wind element.

original: de'i nang na khyab par byed pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba dang dmigs pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni nam mkha'i 'byung ba chen po ste /
analyzed: de'i nang na khyab par byed pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba dang dmigs pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni nam mkha'i 'byung ba chen po ste /
translated: That which is the innate bliss pervading within it and the essence of non-apprehending is the space element.

original: de'i phyir 'byung ba lnga'i ngo bo can yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'byung ba lnga'i ngo bo can yin no //
translated: Therefore, it has the nature of the five elements.

original: de lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems thig le'i gzugs can padma'i sna rtser zhes bya ba nye bar mtshon pa ste /
analyzed: de lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems thig le'i gzugs can padma'i sna rtser zhes bya ba nye bar mtshon pa ste /
translated: Such bodhicitta in the form of a drop at the tip of the lotus is merely an illustration.

original: rdo rje'i rtse mor yan lag thams cad kyi tshigs las bkug nas phyung ste de dag gi rtse mor bzung nas gong bu'i gzugs te rdul phra rab kyi gzugs su brtag par bya zhing /
analyzed: rdo rje'i rtse mor yan lag thams cad kyi tshigs las bkug nas phyung ste de dag gi rtse mor bzung nas gong bu'i gzugs te rdul phra rab kyi gzugs su brtag par bya zhing /
translated: Having drawn it out from the joints of all the limbs to the tip of the vajra, and having held it at the tips of those, one should imagine the form of the mass, that is, the form of the atoms,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa'i rang bzhin du gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa'i rang bzhin du gzung bar bya'o //
translated: and one should hold it as the nature of all the Tathagatas.

original: kun rdzob dang don dam pa dag gi gcig pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir rin chen no //
analyzed: kun rdzob dang don dam pa dag gi gcig pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir rin chen no //
translated: It is a jewel because it is the nature of the unity of the conventional and the ultimate.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir kha dog sna @65a lnga pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir kha dog sna @65a lnga pa'o //
translated: It has five colors because it is the nature of the Tathagatas.

original: srog ste bcu'i bdag nyid can gyi rtsol ba ste steng dang 'og tu bro ba ni srog dang rtsol ba zhes bya bar bshad do //
analyzed: srog ste bcu'i bdag nyid can gyi rtsol ba ste steng dang 'og tu bro ba ni srog dang rtsol ba zhes bya bar bshad do //
translated: The life, that is, the prƒÅ·πáa, and the exertion, that is, the apƒÅna, which move upward and downward, are explained as the prƒÅ·πáa and apƒÅna.

original: rang sngags ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
analyzed: rang sngags ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
translated: One‚Äôs own mantra is the Blessed One, Great Vajradhara.

original: de'i snying gar te thig le'i dbus su bsams nas ni snga ma bzhin du gsal ba dang mi gsal ba'i gzugs can gyi bcom ldan 'das bsam nas so //
analyzed: de'i snying gar te thig le'i dbus su bsams nas ni snga ma bzhin du gsal ba dang mi gsal ba'i gzugs can gyi bcom ldan 'das bsam nas so //
translated: Having imagined it at the heart, that is, in the middle of the drop, one imagines the Blessed One, who has a form that is both clear and unclear, as before.

original: de nas sems rnam par shes pa'i thig ler chud par te yungs kar phra mo'i tshad tsam gyi dbus su gzhag cing dmigs pa de'i tshe sems dbang du byas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas sems rnam par shes pa'i thig ler chud par te yungs kar phra mo'i tshad tsam gyi dbus su gzhag cing dmigs pa de'i tshe sems dbang du byas par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, when one places the mind in the drop of consciousness, that is, in the middle of the drop, which is the size of a mustard seed, and focuses on it, at that time the mind is brought under control.

original: sems dbang du byed pa'i rdul phra rab kyi mthar thug pa dang / tsha ba'i rab kyi mthar thug pa yin no zhes gang bshad pa de dgongs pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: sems dbang du byed pa'i rdul phra rab kyi mthar thug pa dang / tsha ba'i rab kyi mthar thug pa yin no zhes gang bshad pa de dgongs pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: The statement that the mind is brought under control at the end of the subtle particle and the end of heat is not the intended meaning.

original: da ni so sor bshad pa yang 'di nyid kyi bshad pa rdo rje phreng ba zhes bya ba bshad pa'i rgyud las gsungs te zhes bya bas ston te /
analyzed: da ni so sor bshad pa yang 'di nyid kyi bshad pa rdo rje phreng ba zhes bya ba bshad pa'i rgyud las gsungs te zhes bya bas ston te /
translated: Now, the individual explanations are indicated by the words ‚ÄúThis is taught in the explanatory tantra called the Vajra-garland.‚Äù

original: bsam pa ni gal te gang gi tshe rdo rje phreng ba'i rgyud las so sor bshad pas bshad pa de'i tshe gsal ba nyid yin pa'i phyir bde blag tu rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di yin te /
analyzed: bsam pa ni gal te gang gi tshe rdo rje phreng ba'i rgyud las so sor bshad pas bshad pa de'i tshe gsal ba nyid yin pa'i phyir bde blag tu rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di yin te /
translated: The thought is that if it is explained by the individual explanations in the Vajra Garland Tantra, then it will be clear and easy to understand.

original: yi ge'i don to //
analyzed: yi ge'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning of the words.

original: sna rtse yungs kar zhes bya ba srog dang rtsol ba'i brtag pa te /
analyzed: sna rtse yungs kar zhes bya ba srog dang rtsol ba'i brtag pa te /
translated: The tip of the nose is a mustard seed, the examination of prƒÅ·πáa and ƒÅyƒÅma.

original: srog dang rtsol ba la gnas pa'i //
analyzed: srog dang rtsol ba la gnas pa'i //
translated: Abiding in prƒÅ·πáa and ƒÅyƒÅma,

original: 'od lnga sangs rgyas rnams su bsgom //
analyzed: 'od lnga sangs rgyas rnams su bsgom //
translated: the five lights are meditated on as the buddhas.

original: steng gi sna las nges byung ba //
analyzed: steng gi sna las nges byung ba //
translated: Arising from the upper nose,

original: g-yas dang g-yon dang gnyi ga dang // dal bar rgyu dang rnam bzhir 'gyur //
analyzed: g-yas dang g-yon dang gnyi ga dang // dal bar rgyu dang rnam bzhir 'gyur //
translated: there are four: right, left, both, and slow movement.

original: nang gi dus ni yin par bshad //
analyzed: nang gi dus ni yin par bshad //
translated: This is explained as the inner time.

original: lkog ma snying ga lte ba dang // gsang ba'i padmar 'gro 'ong ston //
analyzed: lkog ma snying ga lte ba dang // gsang ba'i padmar 'gro 'ong ston //
translated: Moving to and fro in the throat, heart, navel, and secret lotus,

original: thun phyed kyi ni dus dag tu //
analyzed: thun phyed kyi ni dus dag tu //
translated: in the time of half a period,

original: go rim ji bzhin gnas par 'gyur //
analyzed: go rim ji bzhin gnas par 'gyur //
translated: they abide in their respective places.

original: don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning is as follows.

original: re zhig dang por rnal 'byor pas thabs dang shes rab snyoms par 'jug pas gnas par gyur nas yan lag thams cad kyi tshigs las bsdus pa'i byang chub sems kyi thig le tsam sna rtser yungs kar dang mtshungs pa'i chad tsam snga ma bzhin du srog dang rtsolüîΩbar ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du brtags shing rnam par bsgom nas /
analyzed: re zhig dang por rnal 'byor pas thabs dang shes rab snyoms par 'jug pas gnas par gyur nas yan lag thams cad kyi tshigs las bsdus pa'i byang chub sems kyi thig le tsam sna rtser yungs kar dang mtshungs pa'i chad tsam snga ma bzhin du srog dang rtsol bar ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du brtags shing rnam par bsgom nas /
translated: First, the yogi/nƒ´, abiding in union of method and wisdom, should imagine, as before, the bindu of bodhicitta, the size of a mustard seed, at the tip of the nose, and meditate on the vƒÅyu of prƒÅ·πáa and ƒÅyƒÅma.

original: de'i rjes la srog dang rtsol ba de la gnas pa'i 'od zer lnga sangs rgyas lnga'i ngo bor bsgom par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i rjes la srog dang rtsol ba de la gnas pa'i 'od zer lnga sangs rgyas lnga'i ngo bor bsgom par bya ste /
translated: After that, one should meditate on the five lights abiding in the prƒÅ·πáa and ƒÅyƒÅma as the nature of the five buddhas.

original: de rnams kyang rlung lnga'i ngo bo yin no zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad zin pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: de rnams kyang rlung lnga'i ngo bo yin no zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad zin pa kho na yin no //
translated: Those are the nature of the five vƒÅyus.

original: de'i rjes la lkog ma la sogs pa bzhi po rnams su 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i rang bzhin can gyi @65b dkyil 'khor bzhi'i rang bzhin gyis grub pa 'am /
analyzed: de'i rjes la lkog ma la sogs pa bzhi po rnams su 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i rang bzhin can gyi @65b dkyil 'khor bzhi'i rang bzhin gyis grub pa 'am /
translated: After that, one should meditate on the four ma·πá·∏çalas, which are the nature of the four great elements, in the four places, such as the throat, and so on.

original: ya ra la wa rjes su 'jug pa'i dbyangs dang bcas pa'i sa bon gyis bskyed pa'i gru bzhi dang zlum po dang gzhu lta bu dang gru gsum gyi rnam pa can /
analyzed: ya ra la wa rjes su 'jug pa'i dbyangs dang bcas pa'i sa bon gyis bskyed pa'i gru bzhi dang zlum po dang gzhu lta bu dang gru gsum gyi rnam pa can /
translated: The seed syllables, which are followed by the vowels, generate the forms of the circles, which are square, circular, bow-shaped, and triangular.

original: ser po dang dkar po dang ljang gu dang dmar po dang / rdo rje chu srin dang dril bu dang rgyal mtshan gyi gos dang me 'od kyi phreng bas mtshan pa rnams bsams te /
analyzed: ser po dang dkar po dang ljang gu dang dmar po dang / rdo rje chu srin dang dril bu dang rgyal mtshan gyi gos dang me 'od kyi phreng bas mtshan pa rnams bsams te /
translated: They are yellow, white, green, and red, and are marked with a vajra, a sea monster, a bell, a banner, and a garland of firelight.

original: dkyil 'khor re re las yi ge gsum 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis 'od zer gyi 'khor lo spro bar bya'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor re re las yi ge gsum 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis 'od zer gyi 'khor lo spro bar bya'o //
translated: In each circle, one should visualize the emanation of the circle of light rays through the process of the entry, and so forth, of the three syllables.

original: de yang steng gi sna las te /
analyzed: de yang steng gi sna las te /
translated: Moreover, it is from the upper nostril.

original: gdong gi phyogs las nges par 'byung bar bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: gdong gi phyogs las nges par 'byung bar bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should meditate on the emergence from the face.

original: sna'i bu ga g-yon pa nas rlung gi dkyil 'khor las 'od zer spro bar bya'o //
analyzed: sna'i bu ga g-yon pa nas rlung gi dkyil 'khor las 'od zer spro bar bya'o //
translated: From the left nostril, one should emanate the light rays from the circle of wind.

original: g-yas pa la ni me'i dkyil 'khor las so //
analyzed: g-yas pa la ni me'i dkyil 'khor las so //
translated: From the right, from the circle of fire.

original: gnyi ga las ni sa'i dkyil 'khor las so //
analyzed: gnyi ga las ni sa'i dkyil 'khor las so //
translated: From both, from the circle of earth.

original: gnyi ga kho na las chu'i dkyil 'khor las te /
analyzed: gnyi ga kho na las chu'i dkyil 'khor las te /
translated: From both, the circle of water.

original: 'on kyang dal zhing rgyu ba dman pa'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang dal zhing rgyu ba dman pa'o //
translated: But it moves slowly and weakly.

original: de nyid kho na nang gi dus te nang gi dus tshod kyi bye brag yin par bshad cing brjod do //
analyzed: de nyid kho na nang gi dus te nang gi dus tshod kyi bye brag yin par bshad cing brjod do //
translated: That is the internal time, the specific time of the internal world.

original: ji srid du 'od zer gyi 'khor lo spro bar bya zhe na /
analyzed: ji srid du 'od zer gyi 'khor lo spro bar bya zhe na /
translated: For how long does one radiate the circle of light?

original: thun ni phyed phyed dus dag tu //
analyzed: thun ni phyed phyed dus dag tu //
translated: In half periods,

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: he says.

original: de ci zhig yin par brjod par bya zhe na /
analyzed: de ci zhig yin par brjod par bya zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: 'dir nyin dang mtshan la chu tshod drug cu rtsa bzhi yod de /
analyzed: 'dir nyin dang mtshan la chu tshod drug cu rtsa bzhi yod de /
translated: Here, day and night have seventy-two periods.

original: nyin mo la sum cu rtsa gnyis yod do //
analyzed: nyin mo la sum cu rtsa gnyis yod do //
translated: Day has thirty-two periods.

original: nyin dang mtshan la thun brgyad yod do //
analyzed: nyin dang mtshan la thun brgyad yod do //
translated: Day and night have eight periods.

original: chu tshod brgyad ni thun gyi tshod yin no //
analyzed: chu tshod brgyad ni thun gyi tshod yin no //
translated: Eight periods are the measure of a period.

original: thun dang thun tshod mtshams zhes bya ba ni rnam grangs yin te /
analyzed: thun dang thun tshod mtshams zhes bya ba ni rnam grangs yin te /

original: thun de'i phyed ni chu tshod bzhi'o //
analyzed: thun de'i phyed ni chu tshod bzhi'o //

original: de'i yang phyed ni chu tshod gnyis te /
analyzed: de'i yang phyed ni chu tshod gnyis te /

original: de'i tshad kyi dus su 'od zer sna'i rtse mor gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: de'i tshad kyi dus su 'od zer sna'i rtse mor gzung bar bya'o //

original: go rims ni dkyil 'khor gyi rim pas so //

analyzed: ji bzhin ni g-yas la sogs pa'i rim gyis zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: bsam pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: bsam pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: The idea is as follows.

original: chu tshod brgyad pa'i thun las dbugs dbyung rngub sum cu'i tshod kyi chu tshod phyed ni 'od gsal ba'i skad cig gi dus so //
analyzed: chu tshod brgyad pa'i thun las dbugs dbyung rngub sum cu'i tshod kyi chu tshod phyed ni 'od gsal ba'i skad cig gi dus so //

analyzed: nyin mo thun gsum las chu tshod phyed dang gnyis su 'gyur te /

original: de'i phyir nyin mo la chu tshod gnyis yod do //
analyzed: de'i phyir nyin mo la chu tshod gnyis yod do //
translated: Therefore, there are two watches in the day.

original: mtshan mo'i thun bzhi la yang chu tshod gnyis yod pa'i phyir chu tshod bzhi ni 'od gsal nyams su myong ba'i dus te nang gi dus zhes bya'o //
analyzed: mtshan mo'i thun bzhi la yang chu tshod gnyis yod pa'i phyir chu tshod bzhi ni 'od gsal nyams su myong ba'i dus te nang gi dus zhes bya'o //
translated: And because there are also two watches in the four watches of the night, four watches are the time of experiencing clear light, which is called the inner time.

original: lhag ma chu tshod drug cu ni 'jig rten la grags pa'i nyi zhag yin no zhes bya bar gnas te @66a * //
analyzed: lhag ma chu tshod drug cu ni 'jig rten la grags pa'i nyi zhag yin no zhes bya bar gnas te @66a * //

original: dgongs pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: dgongs pa ma yin pa'o //

analyzed: da ni dkyil 'khor bzhi'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa dang kha dog gi dbye ba dang rgyu ba bstan pa'i phyir /

analyzed: 'di ni kha dog dmar zhing gsal //

original: 'di ni padma mgon po'i lha ;
analyzed: 'di ni padma mgon po'i lha ;

analyzed: ljang ser du ni snang ba ste //

original: gnyi ga las ni 'byung ba'i 'od //

analyzed: kha dog ser por snang ba che //

analyzed: de ni dbang chen dkyil 'khor te //

analyzed: 'dir ni rin chen mgon po lha //

original: dal zhing rgyu ba dman pa ste //
analyzed: dal zhing rgyu ba dman pa ste //

analyzed: kunda zla ba bzhin du dkar //

analyzed: de ni chu yi dkyil 'khor te //

analyzed: de'i me'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyi 'od dpag tu med pas byin gyis brlabs par shes par bya'o // de bzhin du sna bug g-yon pa las byung ba gang yin pa de ni dgug pa'i las la nus pa dang ldan pa nyid yin pa'i phyir kha dog ljang gu ste rlung gi dkyil 'khor las spro zhing de ni rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin gyi don yod
translated: One should understand that they are empowered by AmitƒÅbha, who is the nature of the fire element.

analyzed: par grub pas byin gyis brlabs par shes par bya'o //

analyzed: de ni sa'i rang bzhin gyi rin chen 'byung ldan gyis byin gyis brlabs par shes par bya'o //

analyzed: sa ni lo tog dang rin po che la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis rgyas par byed par nus pa'i phyir ro //

translated: Similarly, the light rays that emerge from both nostrils are white in color, because they are endowed with the ability to perform the function of pacifying, and they should be emanated from the ma·πá·∏çala of water.

analyzed: de ni chu'i rang bzhin gyi mi bskyod pas byin gyis brlabs par shes par bya'o //

original: 'dir ni 'di dpyad par bya ste /

analyzed: g-yas kyi rtsa ni byang chub kyi sems gnas pa de'i phyir /

analyzed: de'i rang bzhin gyi 'od dpag tu med par spro'o //
translated: the nature of AmitƒÅbha is emitted from the right.

original: g-yon na khrag gi khams gnas te /
analyzed: g-yon na khrag gi khams gnas te /
translated: The left channel is the abode of the blood constituent,

original: de'i phyir phrag dog dang nga rgyal dag rigs gcig pa nyid yin pa'i phyir rin chen 'byung ldan dang don yod pa dag gcig pas don yod par grub pa'i rang bzhin gyi g-yon pa nas spro'o ;

analyzed: de ji ltar rung ba ma yin nam //

analyzed: de skad du yang kha sbyor las //

original: g-yas dang g-yon dang gnyi ga'o //

analyzed: g-yon na khu ba gnas zhes bya //

original: g-yas na khrag ni gnas pa nyid //
analyzed: g-yas na khrag ni gnas pa nyid //

original: de dag 'dres byed gcig yin te ;
analyzed: de dag 'dres byed gcig yin te ;

original: / chos kyi dbyings ni sdud pa yin //
analyzed: / chos kyi dbyings ni sdud pa yin //

original: zhes gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa ste /
translated: Thus, it is said.

original: de'i phyir tshad ma 'dis 'gal ba yin no zhe na 'gal ba med do //üîΩg-yon dang g-yas kyi rtsa gnyis las lkog ma nas brtsams nas lte ba'i bar du khu ba dang khrag 'bab cing lte ba las 'og tu ni de dag nyid ni 'pho ba'i dbang gis khu ba dang khrag 'bab pa yin no zhes rdo rje phreng ba la sogs
analyzed: de'i phyir tshad ma 'dis 'gal ba yin no zhe na 'gal ba med do // g-yon dang g-yas kyi rtsa gnyis las lkog ma nas brtsams nas lte ba'i bar du khu ba dang khrag 'bab cing lte ba las 'og tu ni de dag nyid ni 'pho ba'i dbang gis khu ba dang khrag 'bab pa yin no zhes rdo rje phreng ba la sogs
translated: Therefore, this is a contradiction.

original: pa las bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: pa las bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: There is no contradiction, because the Vajra Garland and so on teach that from the two channels, the right and left, semen and blood flow from the throat to the navel, and below the navel, by the power of transference, semen and blood flow.

original: bug gnyis nas 'pho ba'i rtsa dbus ma 'dod pa'i gdugs zhes bya ba de ni nam mkha' bzhin du dri ma med pa nyid yin pa dang / de bzhin du gcig 'bab pa nyid yin pa'i phyir rin chen dang mi bskyod pa'i rang bzhin du spro'o//
analyzed: bug gnyis nas 'pho ba'i rtsa dbus ma 'dod pa'i gdugs zhes bya ba de ni nam mkha' bzhin du dri ma med pa nyid yin pa dang / de bzhin du gcig 'bab pa nyid yin pa'i phyir rin chen dang mi bskyod pa'i rang bzhin du spro'o//
translated: The central channel, called the ‚Äúparasol of desire,‚Äù is the channel of transference through the two openings. It is the nature of Ratnasambhava and Ak·π£obhya because it is pure like space and it is the one that descends.

original: zhes pa la nyes ba cung zad kyang med do //
analyzed: zhes pa la nyes ba cung zad kyang med do //
translated: There is not the slightest fault in this.

original: dgongs pa ma yin pa'o //üîΩkhyab byed rlung gi rang bzhin ni //
analyzed: dgongs pa ma yin pa'o // khyab byed rlung gi rang bzhin ni //
translated: This is not the intention.üîΩThe pervading wind‚Äôs nature

original: lus kun la ni khyab pa'i rlung //
analyzed: lus kun la ni khyab pa'i rlung //
translated: is the wind that pervades the whole body.

original: bya ba kun la 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: bya ba kun la 'jug pa'o //

original: de ni rnam snang ngo bo ste /
analyzed: de ni rnam snang ngo bo ste /
translated: It is the essence of Vairocana

original: 'chi ba'i lus las 'byung bar 'gyur //üîΩzhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: 'chi ba'i lus las 'byung bar 'gyur // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: and arises from the body at death.

original: thams cad kyi rten snod kyi 'jig rten rnam par dag par gnas pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi ngo bo khyab byed kyi rlung la dkyil 'khor rim par spro ba dang bsdu ba med de /
analyzed: thams cad kyi rten snod kyi 'jig rten rnam par dag par gnas pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi ngo bo khyab byed kyi rlung la dkyil 'khor rim par spro ba dang bsdu ba med de /
translated: The pure world, the support of all, is the essence of Vairocana, the pervading wind. The ma·πá·∏çala is not emanated and dissolved in stages.

original: 'on kyang lus la ni khyab pa ste /
analyzed: 'on kyang lus la ni khyab pa ste /
translated: However, it pervades the body.

original: tshigs mdung ma lus pa la khyab pa'o //
analyzed: tshigs mdung ma lus pa la khyab pa'o //

original: bya ba kun la ste 'gro ba dang 'ong ba la sogs pa'i bya ba rnams la 'jug pa la ni @67a * //
analyzed: bya ba kun la ste 'gro ba dang 'ong ba la sogs pa'i bya ba rnams la 'jug pa la ni @67a * //
translated: In all actions, in the actions of going, coming, and so forth,

original: 'jug par byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'jug par byed pa'o //
translated: it is the one that engages.üîΩFrom the body, from the corpse of the dead,

analyzed: 'chi ba ste srog gi dbang po dang rnam par shes pa dag 'gags par gyur pa'i lus las te /

original: shi ba'i phung po las 'byung bar 'gyur zhing 'gro bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: shi ba'i phung po las 'byung bar 'gyur zhing 'gro bar 'gyur te /
translated: it arises, it goes forth,üîΩlike an emanation from a hole in the ground.

original: sa'i bug las sprul bzhin du zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
analyzed: sa'i bug las sprul bzhin du zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //

original: de nyid kyi phyir srog 'gags pa'i skad cig de la reg bya'i bye brag 'ga' zhig dmigs pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir srog 'gags pa'i skad cig de la reg bya'i bye brag 'ga' zhig dmigs pa kho na yin no //
translated: Therefore, at that moment when life ceases, only a certain type of tactile object is perceived.

original: mjug bsdu ba ni /
analyzed: mjug bsdu ba ni /
translated: The conclusion is:

original: rlung gi de nyid gsal ba 'di //
analyzed: rlung gi de nyid gsal ba 'di //
translated: This clarity of the reality of wind,

original: ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin can //
analyzed: ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin can //
translated: having the nature of the five wisdoms,

original: rtog ga pa yis mi shes shing //
analyzed: rtog ga pa yis mi shes shing //
translated: is not known by the conceptual,

original: rnal 'byor byis pa'i yul min no //
analyzed: rnal 'byor byis pa'i yul min no //
translated: and is not the domain of childish yogis.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te ;
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te ;
translated: This is what is said.

analyzed: rlung gi de kho na nyid 'di lta bu gsal ba ste gsal bar byas pa'o //

analyzed: ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin can ni sngar bshad pa'i rim pas dgongs pa dang bcas pa nyid du ston pa'o //
translated: Having the nature of the five intuitions is taught to be the intended sense by the above-explained method.

analyzed: de'i phyir rtog ge pa yis zhes bya ba gsungs te /

original: phyogs dang gtan tshigs dang dpe la sogs pa'i sgo dang / rnam par rtog pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dra ba dang / sor mo bskyod pa'i rnam par bshad pas med pa sgrub par byed cing /

translated: By the door of position, reason, example, and so on, and by the net of various kinds of discursive thought, and by the explanation of the movement of the fingers, they establish the nonexistent.

analyzed: 'o na ci nyan thos kyi rigs can rnams snod yin nam zhen rnal 'byor byis pa zhes bya ba gsungs te / de rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i lam la brten nas ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa nyid yin pa'i phyir /
translated: He says, ‚Äúthe yogic practitioner who is a child.‚Äù

original: rnal 'byor pa yang yin la /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa yang yin la /
translated: They are yogic practitioners because they are absorbed in samƒÅdhi in dependence on the path of the four noble truths.

original: brtul zhugs dang sbyangs pa'i yon tan la sogs pas lus sdug bsngal bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir byis pa yang yin pas rnal 'byor byis pa ste /
analyzed: brtul zhugs dang sbyangs pa'i yon tan la sogs pas lus sdug bsngal bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir byis pa yang yin pas rnal 'byor byis pa ste /
translated: They are children because they make the body suffer through austerities and ascetic practices.

original: nyan thos rnams yin no //
analyzed: nyan thos rnams yin no //
translated: The Listeners are the Hearers.

original: de rnams kyi yul min pa ni yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin pa dang bshad par bya ba ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi yul min pa ni yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin pa dang bshad par bya ba ma yin pa'o //
translated: Their domain is not to be known and not to be explained.

original: yang rtog ge pa @67b ni nyan thos pa rnams so //
analyzed: yang rtog ge pa @67b ni nyan thos pa rnams so //
translated: The logicians are the Hearers.

original: rnal 'byor byis pa ni bya ba la sogs pa'i tshul gyis rnal 'byor pa rnams so //
analyzed: rnal 'byor byis pa ni bya ba la sogs pa'i tshul gyis rnal 'byor pa rnams so //
translated: The beginners in yoga are the yogis by way of the method of action, etc.

original: de rnams kyi yul min zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin te sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi yul min zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin te sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: Their domain is not to be known, as before.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni sngags kyi de nyid mdor bstan pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni sngags kyi de nyid mdor bstan pa gsungs te /
translated: Thus, etc. teaches the reality of mantra in brief.

original: rtsa ba'i rgyud las zhes bya ba ni dpal gsang ba 'dus pa las so //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i rgyud las zhes bya ba ni dpal gsang ba 'dus pa las so //
translated: From the Root Tantra means from the glorious Guhyasamaja.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba dang / sngags thams cad kyi snying po kun du skul bar byed pa zhes bya ba la mchog tu gsang ba nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las tshig gi lam nges par brjod pas sngags bsdus pa 'di lta bu gsungs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba dang / sngags thams cad kyi snying po kun du skul bar byed pa zhes bya ba la mchog tu gsang ba nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las tshig gi lam nges par brjod pas sngags bsdus pa 'di lta bu gsungs so //
translated: The essence of all mantras, which is the arousing of all, was spoken by the Vajra Body, Speech, and Mind of all Tathagatas, by the path of words from the most secret Vajra Body, Speech, and Mind, this collection of mantras.

original: don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning is this:

original: sngags kyi de kho na nyid ston pa'i skabs su ji srid sngags 'di ma bstan pa de srid sngags kyi de kho na nyid brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: sngags kyi de kho na nyid ston pa'i skabs su ji srid sngags 'di ma bstan pa de srid sngags kyi de kho na nyid brjod par bya'o //
translated: In the section on teaching the reality of the mantra, as long as this mantra is not taught, the reality of the mantra should be expressed.

original: de'i phyir re zhig sngags kyi bskyed pa gsungs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir re zhig sngags kyi bskyed pa gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, first the generation of the mantra is stated.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ste sku rdo rje la sogs pa rnams kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs te re re zhing sku la sogs pa gang dag yin pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ste sku rdo rje la sogs pa rnams kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs te re re zhing sku la sogs pa gang dag yin pa'o //
translated: Of all the Tathagatas, that is, of the Vajra Body and so forth, the Body, Speech, and Mind, each of which is the Body and so forth.

original: de rnams kyi sa bon nyid dang snying po nyid yin pa'i phyir gsang ba'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi sa bon nyid dang snying po nyid yin pa'i phyir gsang ba'o //
translated: It is secret because it is the seed and the essence of those.

original: de bzhin du sngags thams cad kyi ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du sngags thams cad kyi ste /
translated: Similarly, of all the mantras,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi'o //
translated: of all the Tathagatas.

original: snying po ni thugs kyi nus pa'o //
analyzed: snying po ni thugs kyi nus pa'o //
translated: The essence is the power of the mind.

original: kun du skul bar byed pa ni 'gugs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: kun du skul bar byed pa ni 'gugs par byed pa'o //

original: yang na sngags thams cad kyi ste phyi rol gyi gzhung lugs la grags pa'i sngags drag po rnams kyi snying po skul bar byed pa ni mthu nyams par byed pa'o //
analyzed: yang na sngags thams cad kyi ste phyi rol gyi gzhung lugs la grags pa'i sngags drag po rnams kyi snying po skul bar byed pa ni mthu nyams par byed pa'o //
translated: Or else, the essence of all the mantras, the mantras of Rudra and others known in the external scriptures, the inciter is the one who weakens their power.

original: mchog ni sngags thams cad kyi mchog go //
analyzed: mchog ni sngags thams cad kyi mchog go //
translated: The supreme is the supreme of all mantras.

original: gsang ba ni mi bya ba la sogs pa'i tshul la brten pa rnams la gsang bar bya'o //
analyzed: gsang ba ni mi bya ba la sogs pa'i tshul la brten pa rnams la gsang bar bya'o //
translated: The secret is to be kept secret from those who rely on the way of not doing anything and so forth.

original: de nyid kyi sku la yi ge aom mo //
analyzed: de nyid kyi sku la yi ge aom mo //
translated: The letter Om is in his body.

original: gsung la yi ge a'a:'o //
analyzed: gsung la yi ge a'a:'o //
translated: The letter Ah is in his speech.

original: thugs la yi ge h'um ngo //
analyzed: thugs la yi ge h'um ngo //
translated: The letter Hum is in his mind.

original: 'on kyang sku la sogs pa rnams tha mi dang pa'i phyir tshig gi lam nges par brjod pas te gsung gi lam gyis so //
analyzed: 'on kyang sku la sogs pa rnams tha mi dang pa'i phyir tshig gi lam nges par brjod pas te gsung gi lam gyis so //
translated: However, because the body and so forth are not different, the path of speech, that is, the path of the voice, is certain to be expressed.

original: yang na tshig las te gsung las so //
analyzed: yang na tshig las te gsung las so //
translated: Or else, from the word, that is, from the voice.

original: lam las te sku las so //
analyzed: lam las te sku las so //
translated: From the path, that is, from the body.

original: nges par brjod pa las te thugs las so //
analyzed: nges par brjod pa las te thugs las so //
translated: From the expression, that is, from the mind.

original: sngags ni a'a li k'a la'i bsdus pa'i snying po la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sngags ni a'a li k'a la'i bsdus pa'i snying po la sogs pa'o //

original: bsdus pa ni bud med la sogs pa'i bye brag gis sdud par byed pa'o //
analyzed: bsdus pa ni bud med la sogs pa'i bye brag gis sdud par byed pa'o //
translated: The inclusion is the inclusion by the distinctions of the female, and so forth.

original: gsungs pa ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs pa'o zhes bya ba ni @68a * //
analyzed: gsungs pa ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs pa'o zhes bya ba ni @68a * //
translated: The statement is the statement of the BhagavƒÅn, the Great Vajradhara.

original: ngag gi don to //
analyzed: ngag gi don to //
translated: This is the meaning of the words.

original: de ni dgongs pa ma yin pa dang dgongs pas bshad pa'o //
analyzed: de ni dgongs pa ma yin pa dang dgongs pas bshad pa'o //
translated: That is the non-intentional and the intentional explanation.

original: dpe brjod pa ni /üîΩaom a'a:h'um ste aa ba zhes bya ba'i skad kyi dbyings ni srung ba la sogs pa rnams la 'jug ste /
analyzed: dpe brjod pa ni / aom a'a:h'um ste aa ba zhes bya ba'i skad kyi dbyings ni srung ba la sogs pa rnams la 'jug ste /
translated: The example is stated:üîΩOm, A, Hum. The verbal root ava is used for the protections, and so forth.

original: srung bar byed cing 'jug pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gang bar byed pas ni aom mo //
analyzed: srung bar byed cing 'jug pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gang bar byed pas ni aom mo //
translated: Om is the one that fills by the nature of engaging in the protection and so forth.

original: aa ba'i mtha' ma yang dbye zhing man yang sbyar ro zhes bya ba wa dbyi zhing man gyi rkyen sbyar te aan phyis nas aa aur byas te yon tan byas pas aom zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: aa ba'i mtha' ma yang dbye zhing man yang sbyar ro zhes bya ba wa dbyi zhing man gyi rkyen sbyar te aan phyis nas aa aur byas te yon tan byas pas aom zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Having applied the suffix man to va, and having eliminated the final a and the anusvƒÅra, and having made the a long, it becomes o·πÉ.

original: des na 'jug pa'i bdag nyid can yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: des na 'jug pa'i bdag nyid can yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Therefore, it has the nature of entry.

original: aa sa zhes bya ba'i skad kyi byings ni gnas pa la 'jug ste /
analyzed: aa sa zhes bya ba'i skad kyi byings ni gnas pa la 'jug ste /
translated: The verbal root asa means to abide.

original: sa'i aa phyis nas aan dang aas kyi mtha' can dag ring por 'gyur ro zhes bya bas aa ring por bya zhing sa tsheg drag tu byas pas a'a: zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sa'i aa phyis nas aan dang aas kyi mtha' can dag ring por 'gyur ro zhes bya bas aa ring por bya zhing sa tsheg drag tu byas pas a'a: zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Having eliminated the a of the earth, and having made the a long and the anusvƒÅra long, it becomes ƒÅ·∏•.

original: des na gnas pa'i ngo bo yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //üîΩh'um zhes bya ba'i skad kyi byings ni 'byung ba la 'jug ste /
analyzed: des na gnas pa'i ngo bo yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // h'um zhes bya ba'i skad kyi byings ni 'byung ba la 'jug ste /
translated: Therefore, it has the nature of abiding.üîΩThe verbal root hu·πÉ means to arise.

original: de la man gyi rkyen sbyar nas aan phyi zhing ring por byas pas h'um du 'gyur te /
analyzed: de la man gyi rkyen sbyar nas aan phyi zhing ring por byas pas h'um du 'gyur te /
translated: Having applied the suffix man to it, and having eliminated the anusvƒÅra and made it long, it becomes h≈´·πÉ.

original: des na 'byung ba'i bdag nyid can yin no zhes bya ba'i don te //
analyzed: des na 'byung ba'i bdag nyid can yin no zhes bya ba'i don te //
translated: Therefore, it is the meaning of ‚Äúhaving the nature of the elements.‚Äù

original: yi ge'i don to //
analyzed: yi ge'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning of the syllables.

original: aom ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
analyzed: aom ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
translated: Om is Vairochana.

original: aa ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
analyzed: aa ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
translated: A is Amitabha.

original: h'um ni mi bskyed pa'o zhes bya ba ni dgongs pas bshad pa'o //
analyzed: h'um ni mi bskyed pa'o zhes bya ba ni dgongs pas bshad pa'o //
translated: Hum is Akshobhya. This is the explanation of the intended meaning.

original: aa dang au dang ma 'dus pa las yon tan byas pas aom mo //
analyzed: aa dang au dang ma 'dus pa las yon tan byas pas aom mo //
translated: From the combination of a, u, and m, the quality is made, and so it is om.

original: aa dang aa dang thig le gnyis po rnams las ring por byas pas a'a'o //
analyzed: aa dang aa dang thig le gnyis po rnams las ring por byas pas a'a'o //
translated: From the combination of a, a, and the two bindus, it is lengthened, and so it is ah.

original: mgo dang ha dang au dang zla tshes dang thig la ste lnga po de rnams 'dus pa las h'um te /
analyzed: mgo dang ha dang au dang zla tshes dang thig la ste lnga po de rnams 'dus pa las h'um te /

original: de bzhin gshegs pa gsum dang / de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin gyi yan lag rnams kyi bskyed pa yin no /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa gsum dang / de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin gyi yan lag rnams kyi bskyed pa yin no /
